titleStmt.title: The great question to be considered by the King and this approaching Parliament, briefly proposed, and modestly discussed, (to wit); how far religion is concerned in policy or civil government and policy in religion? ... / by one who desires to give unto Cæsar the things that are Gods.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

titleStmt.title: The great question to be considered by the King and this approaching Parliament, briefly proposed, and modestly discussed, (to wit); how far religion is concerned in policy or civil government and policy in religion? ... / by one who desires to give unto Cæsar the things that are Gods.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to William Penn. cf. NUC pre-1956.
